thread.title: Don't play India in ICC events if Dec series is cancelled: Ehsan Mani
thread.title_full: Don't play India in ICC events if Dec series is cancelled: Ehsan Mani - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Don't play India in ICC events if Dec series is cancelled: Ehsan Mani
text:
*Karachi:* Former ICC chief Ehsan Mani has advised the Pakistan Cricket Board to not play India in the group games of ICC events if the arch-rivals don't play the planned bilateral series in December.
*Ehsan Mani*
Mani, in an interview to PTI, said that Pakistan would have to show some teeth in order to put pressure on the ... Â»
